actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the torture and mutilation of dogs for profit in the Republic of the Philippines.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives protests the torture and mutilation of dogs for profit in the Philippines. Calls upon the Government of the Philippines to enforce existing laws and end the torture and mutilation of dogs.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the torture and mutilation of dogs for profit in the Republic of the Philippines.
